entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
